H0.text: The White Rose Shopping Centre is in which English city. Sheffield

H1.text: The White Rose Shopping Centre is in which English city. Manchester

H2.text: The White Rose Shopping Centre is in which English city. Bradford

H3.text: The White Rose Shopping Centre is in which English city. Leeds

A4.text: The White Rose Centre is a shopping centre in the Beeston area of Leeds, West Yorkshire, England.
